Mirzapur Union () is a union parishad of Atwari Upazila, in Panchagarh District, Rangpur Division of Bangladesh.
Geography and demographics
The union has an area of  and as of 2001 had a population of 24,465. There are 36 villages and 12 mouzas in the union.
